silly.title: LEGO QR codes
silly.description: The latest iOS and Android variants can detect QR codes automatically through the installed camera apps. I built a QR code containing the credentials for our home WiFi, thanks to a bulk purchase of 1x1 stud bricks from Bricklink. 1681 bricks later and my wife has to tolerate this artwork on our living room wall.

silly.title: Physical Instagram camera
silly.description: Reinventing the analog magic of the Kodak Instamatic for the digital age. Using an ESP32 camera module and a lot of mechanical modifications. The original advance film & shutter mechanism triggers a new photo capture, which is instantly uploaded to Instagram. For added effect, the poor low-light performance of the cameras provides stylistically blurred images.

silly.title: Real-life Weasley Clock
silly.description: Most large companies log entry & exit using keycard fobs. Using data scraped from our corporate intranet, I built a working version of the Weasley Family's Clock from the Harry Potter series. The rotational range of servo motor for the hand is very limited, which fortunately means I'll never end up in Mortal Peril.

silly.title: DEN
silly.description: Front-end development of an integrated content capture and sharing tool. Complete design and implementation for web interface, Chrome plugin and supporting back-end architecture

silly.title: Austrian Radiation
silly.description: Realtime monitoring and visualisation of the 111 Austrian Strahlenfr√ºhwarnsystem (radiation early warning system). Background radiation across Austria varies for many reasons, but rarely goes much higher than 1 BED (banana equivalent dose) per hour.

silly.title: Tracking Greenland's Glaciers
silly.description: Four weeks living at the edge of the Leverett glacier in Greenland, conducting research into the flow of super-glacial meltwater using pressure logging electronic tracers equipped with radio beacons.

silly.title: SKANK
silly.description: Year long project to strip down and re-build a Suzuki 4x4 into a skid-steer vehicle. Mechanical design, fabrication and construction of all components. The resulting turning circle was wider than a football pitch.

silly.title: Watzmann Wedding Letterpress
silly.description: A small favour for some close friends in Salzburg.
